entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle or light snow changing to 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then 30 percent chance of drizzle or light snow late in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
